data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shimonoya, Mitsuru (2019): A new species of the genus Parachauliodes (Megaloptera: Corydalidae: Chauliodinae) from Northern Kyushu, Japan. Zootaxa 4585 (1): 151-167, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4585.1.9|6 occurrences
